de.hohenheim.view

Class FigureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hohenheim.view.FigureFactory

  • public class FigureFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0 This Class is the factory class for every Figure. It should be used to create Figures in a RoomMap. Please use only this class to create Figures!
    Author:
    Arthur Kaul, Besim Gashi, Mathias Zwiesele, Daniel Intili, Bernd Hofs‰ﬂ

      • createNode

        public static NodeFigure createNode(NodeMap map,
                    java.lang.String room_name,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    java.lang.Object modellObject)
        This class creates a new Room in a RoomMap.
        Parameters:
        map - The RoomMap where this room should be added.
        room_name - A unique name for the room
        x - The x_position, where the room should be located in the RoomMap.
        y - The y_position, where the room should be located in the RoomMap.
        width - The Width of the room.
        height - The height of the room.
        Returns:
        Roomfigure The room after it was created and attached to a RoomMap.

                            java.lang.Object modellObject)
        Parameters:
        map - The RoomMap where this fork truck should be added.
        in_room - The Room where the fork truck should be positioned at first.
        a - unique id for the fork truck! Developer must ensure this...
        Returns:
        ForkTruckFigure The fork truck after creation.

      • createPath

        public static PathFigure createPath(NodeMap map,
                    NodeFigure start,
                    NodeFigure end,
                    java.lang.Object modellObject,
                    int pathSpeed)
        Parameters:
        map - - The RoomMap where this path should be added.
        start - - The start room from which the path should be drawn.
        end - - The end room to which the path should be drawn.
        modellObject - - The modell object belonging to this PathFigure.
        pathSpeed -
        Returns:
        PathFigure - The path after it is created, connected to the rooms and added to the RoomMap.
